Welcome to the Sparx Developer's Kit online reference. Netspective's Sparx framework allows enterprises to build and deploy more e-business Java applications using fewer programmers, in less time, with higher-quality, and better documentation than conventional application servers and Servlet engines alone.
Sparx is app server and platform neutral and will work with any Java2 JDK and servlet engine or application server like WebLogic, WebSphere, Tomcat, or Resin.
Sparx work great with other frameworks; so, you can start with Struts as your servlet controller and use Sparx to fill out the presentation, business, and data layers.
Try the sample apps and look at the source code for the Sparx examples using ACE online. No software installation or downloads are required.

If you want to get the full benefit of Sparx and create your own applications, download a free copy of the Sparx Evaluation Kit. It comes complete with an app server, database, sample applications, documentation, and an automated installer.
